summary_md: Estonia, in the year 2024, has a GDP per capita of 20,046 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD), with an inflation rate of 3.52% (FP.CPI.TOTL.ZG), and an unemployment rate of 7.83% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS). The average life expectancy is 78.49 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN), and internet usage stands at 93.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS). The country's export growth is represented by 76.27% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).

sections.economy_md: Estonia's economy is characterized by a GDP per capita of 20,046 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and an export growth of 76.27% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS).
sections.labor_md: The labor market in Estonia shows an unemployment rate of 7.83% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS).
sections.digital_md: Internet penetration in Estonia is high, with usage at 93.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS).
sections.health_env_md: The average life expectancy in Estonia is 78.49 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN).

job_seeker: Consider Estonia for employment opportunities with a low unemployment rate of 7.83% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) and a strong digital infrastructure.
entrepreneur: Estonia's GDP per capita of 20,046 USD per person (NY.GDP.PCAP.KD) and export growth of 76.27% (NE.EXP.GNFS.ZS) may offer a favorable environment for business ventures.
The country's high internet usage at 93.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS) supports digital entrepreneurship.
digital_nomad: With an internet usage rate of 93.20% (IT.NET.USER.ZS), Estonia provides a conducive environment for digital nomads.
The country's strong digital infrastructure and low unemployment rate of 7.83% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) make it an attractive destination for remote work.
expat_family: Estonia's high life expectancy of 78.49 years years (SP.DYN.LE00.IN) and low unemployment rate of 7.83% (SL.UEM.TOTL.ZS) contribute to a stable and healthy living environment for expat families.
